module.name: ngs
module.description: Extension to XGAP to support Next Gen Sequencing projects using the Illumina platform.

entity.name: Project
entity.description: A Project is a type of panel, meant to hold all ngs info about a project. For example, starting and ending date.

field.name: contractcode
field.description: Contract code/Declaratie Nr (i.e. GG45)

field.name: startdate
field.description: Start date of the project (e.g. 2010-20-10 10:34:56)

field.name: enddate
field.description: End date of the project (e.g. 2010-30-10 14:42:11)

field.name: investigator_id
field.description: Researcher in this project

field.name: labworker_id
field.description: Lab technician in charge of project

field.name: customer
field.description: Customer/Organization for a Project

field.name: workflow
field.description: Project Workflow

entity.name: Flowcell
entity.description: A Flowcell is a unit of, currently, 8 lanes measurement on the Illumina Genome Analyzer

field.name: Machine
field.description: The machine on which this flowcell is run.

entity.name: Library
entity.description: This extended study provides extra fields for saving information of the customer, such as their address, telephone number, etc

field.name: sampletype
field.description: Type of sample (dna/rna). Will become ontologyReference

field.name: fragmentlength
field.description: Length of the sample fragments

field.name: description
field.description: Description/Notes about the sample

field.name: Samples
field.description: One sample, or a pool of samples, from which this library was prepared

entity.name: FlowcellLaneLibrary
entity.description: A lane is one lane on the Illumina Genome Analyzer

field.name: Flowcell
field.description: The flowcell to which this lane belongs

field.name: LaneNumber
field.description: The lane number that is unique within a flow cell. Typically in range 1-8

field.name: Library
field.description: The library (or barcoded libraries) which is (are) measured in this lane

unique.description: Lane number is unique per flowcell

entity.name: NgsSample
entity.description: This extended investigation provides extra fields for saving information of the customer, such as their address, telephone number, etc

field.name: sampletype
field.description: Type of sample (dna/rna)

field.name: origin
field.description: Origin of the sample (i.e. duck, pig, human)

field.name: fragmentlength
field.description: Length of the sample fragment

field.name: readlength
field.description: Length of the read to be executed

field.name: location
field.description: Location of a sample (i.e. freezer in rom 502.20)

field.name: description
field.description: Description/Notes about the sample

field.name: project
field.description: Project that the sample belongs to

field.name: workflowElement
field.description: At what workflow element the sample is currently at

entity.name: ProjectWorkflow
entity.label: Project Workflow
entity.description: A project workflow describes the protocol applications that exist for a given project, per sample.

field.name: workflow
field.description: Reference to the workflow

field.name: project
field.description: Reference to the project which contains the given protocolApp

field.name: NgsSample
field.description: Reference to the sample which will follow the protocol

field.name: labworker
field.description: Indicate whether the contact is a labworker
